name: WordPress
support: Open Source, supported by most hosting companies
capabilities: Supports themes, plugins, and provides a public REST API

name: Drupal
support: Open Source, maintained by the Drupal Association
capabilities: Highly customizable, supports complex content structures, multilingual support
limitations: Steep learning curve, fewer ready-made themes than WordPress

name: Joomla
support: Open Source, supported by Open Source Matters, Inc.
capabilities: User management, multilingual support, large extension library

name: Ghost
support: Open Source, developed by the Ghost Foundation
capabilities: Focus on blogging, clean UI, fast performance, RESTful API
limitations: Limited plugins, not ideal for complex multi-page sites

name: Squarespace
technology: Proprietary platform, runs on cloud infrastructure
capabilities: Drag-and-drop site builder, hosting included, responsive templates
limitations: Limited customization, higher cost, no access to underlying code
